t: Brand Colors
s: The Alexa brand’s primary color is Alexa Blue. Use it and the following colors to ensure that your marketing materials remain consistent with the Alexa brand · Contrast ratio: White text: 3.02 (contrast too low, don't use) Squid Ink text: 4.49 (contrast too low, don't use)

t: Amazon Colors - Hex, RGB, CMYK, Pantone | Color Codes - U.S. Brand Colors
s: The official Amazon colors are Amazon Orange and black. We recommend using the Amazon color palette for personal projects and in the case of commercial use to visit the company website.
